name: Marrakech City Tour
description: Explore the vibrant city of Marrakech, visiting iconic sites like Jemaa el-Fnaa, Koutoubia Mosque, and the Majorelle Garden.

name: Atlas Mountains Day Trip
description: A day trip to the Atlas Mountains, including visits to traditional Berber villages and stunning viewpoints.

name: Sahara Desert Adventure
description: Experience the Sahara Desert with camel trekking, dune camping, and visits to ancient kasbahs.

name: Chefchaouen Blue City Tour
description: Discover the blue-washed streets of Chefchaouen, a picturesque town in the Rif Mountains.

name: Fes Historical Tour
description: Explore the ancient city of Fes, including visits to the Medina, Al Quaraouiyine University, and traditional tanneries.

name: Essaouira Coastal Excursion
description: Visit the coastal city of Essaouira, known for its beautiful beaches, historic medina, and vibrant arts scene.

name: Casablanca City Tour
description: A guided tour of Casablanca, including the Hassan II Mosque, the Corniche, and the Royal Palace.

name: Ouzoud Waterfalls Tour
description: Visit the stunning Ouzoud Waterfalls, one of Moroccoâ€™s most beautiful natural attractions.

name: Merzouga Desert Experience
description: A journey into the heart of the Merzouga Desert with camel rides, sandboarding, and nights under the stars.

name: Tangier and Asilah Day Trip
description: Explore the northern cities of Tangier and Asilah, known for their historical medinas and coastal charm.

name: Meknes and Volubilis Tour
description: Discover the imperial city of Meknes and the ancient Roman ruins of Volubilis.

name: Agadir Beach Day
description: Relax on the beautiful beaches of Agadir, with optional water sports and seaside activities.

name: Rabat City Tour
description: Visit the capital city of Rabat, including the Hassan Tower, Royal Palace, and the Kasbah of the Udayas.

name: Dades Valley and Todra Gorge
description: A scenic tour through the Dades Valley and the impressive Todra Gorge, with stops at kasbahs and oases.

name: Ait Benhaddou Kasbah Tour
description: Visit the famous Ait Benhaddou Kasbah, a UNESCO World Heritage site featured in many movies.

name: Ouarzazate Film Studio Tour
description: Explore the 'Hollywood of Morocco,' including the Atlas Film Studios and the Kasbah Taourirt.

name: Tangier to Chefchaouen Overnight
description: A short getaway to the enchanting blue city of Chefchaouen from Tangier, with an overnight stay.

name: Marrakech to Zagora Desert Tour
description: A quick desert escape to Zagora with camel rides and a night in a desert camp.

name: Moroccan Cooking Class
description: Learn to cook traditional Moroccan dishes with a hands-on cooking class in Marrakech.

name: High Atlas Trekking Adventure
description: Trek through the High Atlas Mountains, exploring remote Berber villages and stunning landscapes.
